Unleash the power of effortless tab management with PaneMaster.
Whether you're juggling multiple projects or simply love keeping your browsing experience organized, PaneMaster is here to transform your workflow. Group, save, and access your browser panes(tabs) with ease, ensuring that your favorite sites and sessions are always within reach.

Why PaneMaster?

Custom Groups: Organize panes into personalized groups for specific projects or topics.
Tagging: Add meaningful tags to groups and quickly locate them when needed.
Sleek Interface: Experience seamless navigation with our user-friendly design.
Quick Access: Effortlessly restore saved sessions with just a click.
Shared Groups: Collaborate efficiently by sharing tab groups with teammates or friends.

Upcoming Features â€“
Auto-Save Sessions: Automatically save your panes sessions at regular intervals or upon browser closure, ensuring you never lose a single pane.
Cloud Sync: Access your saved sessions and groups across devices with secure cloud synchronization.
Dark Mode: A sleek, eye-friendly dark mode for browsing during late hours.
Customizable Hotkeys: Switch groups or restore sessions faster with user-defined keyboard shortcuts.
Pin Groups: Keep your most-used tab groups pinned for instant access.

Say goodbye to tab clutter and hello to a smarter, more productive browsing experience.
